body.section:
Following use cases describe the component’s behavior as it responds to a series of related requests from the user.
Use-Case 1
Description: Document Upload.
Actor: Any Component or Allowed User.
Pre-condition: Authenticated
Post-condition: NA
Basic Flows:
1. User initiates the request to save content or file.
2. A Component collects the data and sends request to DMS.
3. DMS collects and stores the data.
4. The requestor is given back XML or acceptance status.
Use-Case 2
Description: Document Download.
Actor: Any Component or Allowed User.
Pre-condition: Authenticated
Post-condition: NA
Basic Flows:
1. User initiates the retrieve request Component.
2. A Component retrieve the data from storage.
3. Display or Send the retrieve data to requestor.
